title: Calories in a Calzone Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in a calzone pizza, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and tips for variations under 160 characters.
assumptions: Standard cheese calzone with marinara sauce and dough; approx. 300g serving, baked, no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, fillings, brand, and baking method. Check labels or recipes when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical calzone pizza contains about 650 kcal with balanced macros from dough and cheese.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant items.

faqs.q: How many calories in a calzone pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 650 kcal for a standard cheese calzone pizza.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a calzone pizza?
faqs.a: About 75 g carbs, mostly from the dough.

faqs.q: Is a calzone pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1200 mg due to sauce and cheese.

faqs.q: How does adding meat affect calories in a calzone pizza?
faqs.a: Adds about 100 kcal or more, depending on the meat type.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie calzone pizza?
faqs.a: Yes, use veggies, reduce cheese, or opt for whole wheat dough to cut 20-100 kcal.
